name: 伏魔
description:
"Fumo" is a 3D MMORPG with the theme of Eastern Immortal Heroes. The game is set in "Fengshen Yanyi" as the story background, showcasing the increasingly fierce struggle between Buddhism, demons, and Taoism in the human world 1500 years after being Fengshen. It showcases the story of once again creating a new world after the escalating disputes between the mortal world, the immortal, demonic, and divine realms in the human world! The combination of beautiful Chinese painting style and ancient epics creates a magnificent and imaginative painting scroll for players.

In the game, players will incarnate as the junior brothers and sisters of Taoism Sanqing, assisting Emperor Jiang Li in his campaign against Emperor Taiyi, ultimately recovering their memories from their past lives, and breaking free from the arrangements of the Primordial Heavenly Lord and Laozi, uniting Pangu's physical body to become a saint and once again creating a new world!

The long-awaited hot blooded PK, dazzling skill effects, mysterious fairy equipment, intense and thrilling Heavenly Court Battle, smooth game progress, and many other unique gameplay features of "Demon Suppression" will undoubtedly bring players the most exciting and ultimate gaming experience!

The story is set against the well-known "Journey to the West" and "Fengshen Bang". It takes place 1500 years after being enfeoffed as a god, and the struggle between the Buddhist, demonic, and Taoist religions in the human world intensifies. The human world is plagued by wars and countless unjust souls, which trigger the evil energy of heaven and earth and cause sudden changes in celestial phenomena, implying that the first calamity of Pangu Kaitian is about to come.

Wu Chao, who had always been unwilling to be the demon prince but has fallen to this day, saw this opportunity and began to be restless. He searched everywhere for the ancient demon gods who had been lobbying and retreating, the side door demon paths that had been scattered and cultivated, and the ancient witch ancestors who had infiltrated the gaps in the three realms, forming a secret alliance, attempting to subvert the ruling position of Buddhism, Taoism, and humans in the three realms by taking advantage of the opportunity of the second sealing of gods, and recreate the situation where ancient witches and demons each controlled the world.

At this moment, a soul should descend into the world of Pangu, and this person will regain Pangu's essence and blood, forging Pangu's true body. If the second attempt to seal the gods fails, they will use the Pangu Divine Axe to reopen the heavens and earth, completely dispel the evil energy of the heavens and earth, and end this massive calamity that has lasted for 5.6 billion years since the previous one.
